charges.charge_description: 18:115.F AGGRAVATED OR FELONIOUS-defendant did threaten to murder Senior District Judge, Lucius Bunton (1)

charges.charge_disposition: It is ordered that the defendant shall pay a special assessment of $50.00 which shall be due payable immediately to Clerk, U.S. District Court. The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a term of 21 months. Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of 3 years. (1)

charges.charge_description: On or about February 2, 1995 in Midland County, in the Western District of Texas, defendant did treaten to kill Senior District Judge, Lucius D. Bunton, III in violation of Title 18, U.S.C., Section 115(a)(1)(B) [7:95-m-8]
